ch0092_00_iris/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been craning my neck like a
Haxorus trying to find you around here!
ch0092_00_iris/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m glad I got to meet up with
you today! We should go do
some exploring!
ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_01_10:
I grew up in a mysterious place called
the Village of Dragons.
ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_02_10:
It’s a really awesome place where people
and Dragon-type Pokémon live together
in harmony!
ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_03_10:
Haxorus was basically my neighborhood
buddy when we were growing up.
Nowadays, we might as well be family!
ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_04_10:
Hmm... If we were really family, would
that make Haxorus my big sister? Weird,
since I’m the one always taking care of her.
ch0092_00_iris/0601_0702_01_10:
Before my Haxorus evolved, she was
smaller than I am! Can you believe that?
ch0092_00_iris/0601_0702_02_10:
She was so itty-bitty.
She used to play inside my hair
everywhere we went!
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_01_10: What do you think it means to be an adult?
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_02_10:
Like...dressing fancy? And caring about
important stuff? Using big, fancy words?
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_03_10:
I know I can’t be a kid forever,
and I’ve gotta grow up at some point.
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_04_10:
I’ve been kinda copying what other
adults do recently, but I don’t
really get it.
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_05_10:
You know what? I don’t wanna change!
I’m just gonna keep acting like my
normal kid self!
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0702_01_10:
I asked old Grandpa what it means to
be an adult, and he said nobody knows!
ch0092_00_iris/0602_0702_02_10:
If nobody knows, how’s a kid like me
supposed to know?!
ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m Iris!
The girl who knows the hearts of dragons!
ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_02_10:
Tee-hee! That almost sounds like it
came from one of those TV specials, huh?
ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_03_10:
“Mystic Discoveries: The Girl
Who Was Raised by Dragon Pokémon”
kinda has a nice ring to it!
ch0092_00_iris/0603_0702_01_10:
If I ever do get put on TV, I wanna
show the world that Dragon-type
Pokémon aren’t really scary.
ch0092_00_iris/0603_0702_02_10:
Sometimes they get moody and angry—
but so do people!
ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_01_10:
Isn’t my hairstyle super cool?!
People always tell me it’s the
first thing they notice!
ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_02_10:
My hair’s so big and fluffy that I can
actually store things in there if I want!
ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_03_10:
This one time, Haxorus hid some Berries
in it, and when we took them out later, they
looked exactly the same! Weird, right?!
ch0092_00_iris/0604_0702_01_10:
I always take really good care
of my hair!
ch0092_00_iris/0604_0702_02_10: I mean, it’s my trademark, after all!
ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m walking around downtown
Pasio, I can’t help fidgeting and
looking around everywhere...
ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_02_10:
Where I grew up, my only playgrounds
were forests and waterfalls. Being in the
big city makes me so nervous!
ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_04_10:
You should come play with us sometime,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll teach you some
cool tips for playing tag!
ch0092_00_iris/0605_0702_01_10:
It’s kinda hard to compare the big city
to somewhere full of nature—
they’re way too different!
ch0092_00_iris/0605_0702_02_10:
When I’m surrounded by nature, it makes
me think of my hometown, the Village of
Dragons. It’s nice and nostalgic!
ch0092_00_iris/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, take this!
I’m pretty sure it’ll be useful!
ch0092_00_iris/1701_0701_02_10:
Haxorus said it might be dangerous
if I step on it, so she brought it over!
ch0092_00_iris/1701_0702_01_10:
Haxorus looks super big and strong,
but she’s actually really gentle
and well behaved!
ch0092_00_iris/1701_0702_02_10:
Then again...she can get pretty scary
when she’s mad!
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been around Pokémon my whole life,
and battling has always been like
second nature to me.
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_02_10:
Before I knew it, I’d gotten to be
super strong!
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_03_10:
Getting to battle all the time used to seem
super normal to me, but it’s actually
kinda awesome!
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_04_10:
And also getting to meet and become
friends with so many cool people!
That part is super awesome, too!
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_05_10:
Let’s aim to be the best of the best
Pokémon Trainers out there!
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0702_01_10:
I feel like together we can both grow
sooo much stronger!
ch0092_00_iris/2501_0702_02_10:
Imagine what the view would look like!
Standing proudly at the top—
the greatest Pokémon Trainer ever!
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_01_10:
Grandpa Drayden always says that
people and Pokémon have to trust and
depend on each other to live.
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why I battle together with my
Pokémon! So that we can deepen our
trust and friendship!
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_03_10:
In a Pokémon battle, the Trainer’s heart and
the Pokémon’s heart become one!
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_04_10:
If we give it our all, it doesn’t
matter if we win or lose!
We’re still smiling in the end!
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_01_10:
Pokémon have an awesome power
inside of them that we, as people, don’t.
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_02_10:
But you know what? The fact that we get to
become such good friends with such awesome
Pokémon is also super cool!
ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_03_10:
Don’t you think so?! I gotta keep
battling so I can learn everything there is
to know about Pokémon and Trainers!
ch0092_00_iris/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Gotta make sure you’re dressed well!
ch0092_00_iris/3002_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna let my Pokémon do some sunbathing
this morning, while the sun’s nice and bright!
ch0092_00_iris/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi! Kids shouldn’t be afraid of the outdoors.
Come on—let’s go out and play!
ch0092_00_iris/3004_0701_01_10:
It’s so bright outside! Makes me want to lie
down and soak up some sun with my Pokémon!
ch0092_00_iris/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening! Ready for more fun?
Back at the Village of Dragons, lots of
Pokémon become more active at night!
ch0092_00_iris/3006_0701_01_10:
My granddad always said that
children who sleep well grow well!
